entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
